lines: You'll find no finer goods of Men this side of the Mountains!
I'd be willing to buy goods of you for a fair price.
Need some supplies for the road?
I sell the finest wares of Bree!
May I tempt you with the finest Southlinch?
Have you ever been to Bree? I can give you a taste of what we have to offer if you have some coin.
I bring the finest goods of The Hill!
I have many fine goods to trade!
I bring greetings and well-wishes from the Men of Bree!
Have you come to trade, #p?
I have many goods to sell. Come, come quickly!
Hello #p! Would you like to browse my wares?
Greetings, #p! I come from the Lands of Bree.
What would you like to buy today, #p?
#p! Need some supplies for the road?
Hello #p! I have travelled far to find you, would you like some goods of Bree for your travels?
Hello #p! Would you like to browse my wares?
You're not one of them Halflings! Perhaps you'll trust my wares more then these Little-folk.
Don't trust what those Little-folk say about my goods! I price fairly, its them who drive a hard bargain.
The Little-folk here dont fancy my pipeweed, perhaps you'd like to try some Southlinch?
The Little-folk of the colonies don't care much for us Bree-folk.

lines: Don't trust them Ruffians heading through these lands, one of them sold me false goods!
If you're going to be travelling through such wild lands as these, you ought to buy some supplies from me!
You don't look to be one of them Ruffians, would you like to trade?
A thief stole some coins of mine while passing through the Greenway! Would you do me a favor and buy something from me?
I don't trust them Rangers, but they pay fairly.
These lands are wild, you ought to trade with me while you have the chance.
We get strange folk coming up from the South, I try not to trade with them.
I can't be in these lands for too long, don't want robbers or Goblins to get me.
I dont trade with Ruffians!
I better not see your face again near Bree!
I don't trade with thieves, be gone!
You won't buy any goods from me!
Be gone! Robber!
Be on your way, #p!
I won't be selling anything to you.
Run off! Else I'll beat you with this!
The guards will be after you, #p!
I don't care how much money you have, #p, you're not buying anything from me!
I don't deal with Ruffians, #p!
I hope one of them Rangers catches you!
You are no friend of Bree, #p!
